abstract: The company is most likely responding to the demands of mobile users who expect apps to deliver services on their own.
snippet: The company is most likely responding to the demands of mobile users who expect apps to deliver services on their own.
lead_paragraph: For many users, Google Plus accounts don’t get all that many visits. Now, Google seems to be indicating it, too, will be paying less attention to its social network.

headline.main: Google Loosens Ties to Google Plus
